channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump, Starmer sign multibillion-dollar tech deal on AI, nuclear energy and other innovations
item.description: President Trump and British Prime Minister Keir Starmer signed a multibillion-dollar technology pact Thursday boosting cooperation in artificial intel...

item.title: The Atlantic’s Originalist Sin
item.description: A historian misrepresents conservative jurisprudence and misunderstands the greatness of our founding document.

item.title: The Tragedy of Lifespans in Politics
item.description: Charlie Kirk was denied the chance to grow and mature in political commentary.

item.title: Reactions pour in about ABC's suspension of Jimmy Kimmel's show

item.title: Stop Sending Your Kids To Schools Where Teachers Celebrate Murder
item.description: A system that has granted such power to murder-loving ideologues cannot be redeemed; it must be destroyed and remade.

item.title: The Trump Admin Is Right To Screen Potential U.S. Citizens For ‘Good Moral Character’

item.title: Any TikTok Deal Must Separate It from China
item.description: The administration, having long flouted the law, now appears poised to evade it permanently.

item.title: Trump repeats that Ukraine war is harder to end than he thought, says Putin let him down

item.title: American History’s Stark Warning Against Tolerating Political Violence
item.description: In the runup to the Civil War, the beating of a U.S. senator nearly to death was celebrated across the South.

item.title: ‘Self-Care’ Spending Might Explain Why America Is So Deeply In Debt
item.description: However much we want to blame Congress for the nation’s budgetary woes, our lawmakers do little more than reflect the societal zeitgeist.

item.title: A Visit to the University of Texas’s Art Museum in Austin
item.description: A nice place, but someone should explain what ‘extraction’ means to the wealth of the nation and people’s paychecks.

item.title: Charlie Kirk’s Horrific Murder Is a Tragedy — and a Warning
item.description: If we are to remain the place the Founders hoped we would be, then we cannot ever treat such events as acceptable or deserved.

item.title: UATX An Outlier Among Colleges In Expressing Opposition To Charlie Kirk’s Assassination
item.description: The dean of UATX wrote to students and faculty describing security measures in place and reaffirming UATX’s commitment to free speech.
